version_description:
- New Levels: Nest in the Forest & An Adventure in Black and White
- New ICloud Sync functionality to store player status
- New GameCenter Leaderboard
- GameCenter improvements
- Minor level bugs solved

Update that brings you the AMAZING end of the story between Kosmo and Nova.

- New Levels: A Mall of Zombies, The Last Piece & Ending
- New GameCenter Achievements
- Silence button functionality added
- Minor level bugs solved
- GameCenter achievements bugs solved

-iPhone X Compatibility
-Loading system improved
-Lower battery consumption
-New camera system for iPhone Plus devices
-Minor bug fixes
Resolved camera issue on certain devices
